[[File:Upgrade.png|thumb|200px|The Upgrade]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Upgrade costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Johto:_Locations_and_items|Goldenrod City]] in [[Johto]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Porygon.png|40px]] Porygon || Porygon2 |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
